text: PROPAGATION SCHEME When a txn commits on a replicated database, the DBMS decides whether it must wait for that txn's changes to propagate to other nodes before it can send the acknowledgement to application. Propagation levels: — Synchronous (Strong Consistency) — Asynchronous (Eventual Consistency) £2CMUDB i; = — M » PI ® 568/122 e % tG 23 - Distributed OLTP Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
